title: PenAir Travel Agency Software
description:
Penguin has been a leader in travel technology, providing integrated mid/back office systems, ERP, CRM, accounting tools, and payment solutions. We work with forward-thinking companies to craft innovative solutions for modern travel agents.

Our mission is to empower travel businesses by streamlining workflows, boosting productivity, and enhancing customer experiences.

We are proudly partnered with 75+ Travel Solutions, including AMEX, VISA, and MasterCard.
